plot: When a woman inherits a shoe box of keepsakes after her grandmother dies, she soon discovers the profound impact the items have on all those left behind.
title: The Shoe Box
plot_es: When a woman inherits a shoe box of keepsakes after her grandmother dies, she soon discovers the profound impact the items have on all those left behind.
plot_en: When a woman inherits a shoe box of keepsakes after her grandmother dies, she soon discovers the profound impact the items have on all those left behind.
